title: Aural set, Let me let you - section 2

content.description:
Questions 34-38 are based on an excerpt from a song that is in two sections, as indicated below. The excerpt will be played four times. Before listening to the music for the first time, please look over the lyrics of the song, provided below, and read Questions 34-38.
 Section 1:We spent the night out on the city streets, can you feel it too,right then we were invincibleI can't remember the last time I felt this way, like I wasborn to be right here, lost in your eyes.Section 2:We've only got tonight, and I think you know I want you,take me by the hand, give me more than just a good timelet me show you how we'll make it feel like foreverbaby won't you let me let you let me let you let go!

Jess Chizuk / Getty Images
content.question: Which of the following statements accurately describes the music in section 2 ?

choices.label: The mode changes from major to minor.
The musical texture and rhythmic patterns intensify.
The lead singer moves to a new vocal register.

content.answer: The musical texture and rhythmic patterns intensify.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.G: Use terms and symbols to describe aspects of musical design in performed music, including texture, timbre, and instrumentation, and expressive elements, including dynamics, articulation, and tempo.
